CustomField.description: The marketable name for an official Academic Interest (or group of interests) that the individual is inquiring about. A lookup to Plan with a filter criteria of Record Type = Recruitment. Used in building the Opportunity Key for the Interaction Processor to determine whether to create a new Opportunity or update an existing Opportunity for a decentralized recruitment process.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The marketable name for an official Academic Interest (or group of interests) that the individual is inquiring about.
CustomField.label: Recruitment Interest
